# lineLayoutDirection

**Instance Property**

Ordering of lines within a page. For example, top-to-bottom for English; right-to-left for Mongolian in the Mongolian Script

## Declaration

```swift
var lineLayoutDirection: Locale.LanguageDirection { get }
```

## Discussion
title: lineLayoutDirection
